title: Strengthening Practical Mathematical Competencies Through Smart Learning Experience Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and workplace data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Constructing a case-based learning environment to strengthen workplace relevance for professionals. Flexible learning experiences are provided through the use of personal smart devices.

learning_goals: Learners can independently solve at least 80% of workplace-related mathematical problems using smart technologies.
Learners perform knowledge sharing with peers at least three times using collaboration tools (Zoom Whiteboard, Miro, etc.) when working on real-life data-driven projects.
Learners compile and submit case studies of digital tool utilization experienced during the learning process into a portfolio.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
